name: Destroy All Asteroids
description:
Destroy all asteroids and don't die, please. A minigame that has been created within a week during a game jam battle I have with nertro. Shoot and evade all asteroids but use your energy wisely. That's all.

Tips:

  • Focus on one thing: evading or shooting.
  • Your ship is repaired when you have full energy.
  • Use a controller! (tested with xbox360, but most should work)
  • With O and P you can spawn even more asteroids.

Note to Windows Version: Thanks to unity there's a version for Windows, however I haven't tested it. It should run, but there's a chance it won't.
